author: Garrey Dawson
method: Heat the olive oil in a pan and gently fry the onion and garlic for 3-4 minutes, or until softened, then stir the cream and reduce for 3-4 minutes.  Stir in the prawns and spring onion, then add the cooked pasta and stir well to coat. Heat through for 1-2 minutes, then add the parsley, egg yolk and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Stir in the lemon juice.  Place the pasta onto a serving dish and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  150ml/5fl oz double cream,  85g/3oz cooked prawns, peeled,  1 spring onion, finely sliced,  100g/3½oz ready-cooked tagliatelle pasta,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  1 free-range egg yolk,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  ½ lemon, juice only
